entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the morning then snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
